description: Garrett Cooper is searching for a story—as an investigative journalist, he’s ready to expose his family’s secrets. A crime that tore his family apart is the focus, and his stepfather Colby Jansen provides not only the beginnings of a juicy story, but also his big juicy cock after Garrett works him into a horny frenzy. Colby fits right inside Garrett, fucking him to a pleasurable climax over the family pool table.
title: Family Secrets Part 1
